# [Data Visualization]{.flow} {.title}

- Data visualization is the process of creating visual representations of data
- It allows us to understand the data in a more intuitive way
- It helps us to identify patterns, trends, and outliers in the data

# [Beautiful Plotting]{.flow} {.title}

- There are many libraries for data visualization in Python
- Some of the most popular libraries are:
    - Matplotlib
    - Seaborn
    - Plotly
    - Bokeh
    - Altair
    - GeoPandas
    - Geoplot
    - Geoplotlib
